page.title: 16PUBLIC FIGURES PRESTON CAPES
page.content:
NORMAN ST JOHN STEVAS
Member of Parliament for Chelmsford, Essex.His home address is in London, but is on the electoral roll of Preston Capes. He has been Leader of the House of Commons and Minister for the Arts. A bachelor and author of many books and contributor to many literary suplements.
Mr. St.John Stevas, a Roman Catholic is ecumenical and regularlu attends Church of England services. He is a benefactor of Preston Capes Church. The east window is dedicated to his godson.
